name: FEZTAL
description:
Overview

FEZTAL is a very short game, which can be described as a fusion of FEZ and Portal. Use a combination of Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device and Gomez's unique abilities to navigate through test chambers.

Disclaimer: End-game FEZ knowledge is needed for the last puzzle

Special Thanks
  • 0x0ade for creating sound effects for title screen
  • Dango360 for composing gameplay music
  • Hoshiyami for making ending room music
  • Polytron Corporation for creating FEZ
  • Valve for creating Portal and Portal 2
  • All of you for watching and playing my stuff
